about_the_game:
This Season Pass will apply to 72 costumes, 12 BGM tracks, and a new character released during the period of July 2019 - September 2019.
Features two extra costumes as the bonus content.

■ Season Pass 2 Bonus Content
- Marie Rose "Little" Devil Maid Costume (with glasses)
- Honoka Makeover School Uniform Costume (with glasses)

■ Featured Content
- Seaside Eden Costume Set (26 Costumes)
- Vacation to Paradise BGM Set (12 Tracks)
- Summer Breeze Collection (15 Costumes)
- Character: Momiji
- Momiji Debut Costume Set (5 Costumes)
- Morphing Ninja Costume Set (26 Costumes)

■ Note:
- Please visit the official website for more details.
- All content included in this Season Pass will also be sold separately. Please beware of redundant purchases.
- You must purchase the characters before using new costumes.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content

Features two extra costumes as the bonus content.

name: DOA6 Season Pass 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over

short_description: This Season Pass will apply to 72 costumes, 12 BGM tracks, and a new character released during the period of July 2019 - September 2019. Features two extra costumes as the bonus content.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
